description.p: Sets the active TabbedUI pane by pane index.
The pane index. The pane index is zero-based (i.e. the first pane's index is 0).

discussion.p: The *[js:tbiObj.selectPaneByIndex()]* method selects the active pane by index number. Panes in a tabbed ui are zero-based index. This means the first pane has an index of 0, the second and index of 1, and so on.
